general.limit_hint: 0 = no limit. WARNING: the download may take a very long time without a limit and may also be aborted due to a timeout. If necessary, reduce the radius or choose a suitable limit.
general.cache_type_hint: Garmin GPS devices do not support Adventure Labs. You probably want to export them as virtual or event caches.

code.custom_code_template_hint: leave empty for automatic. See Wiki:

personalization.user_guid_hint:
Go to https://www.geocaching.com/find/default.aspx and look up your own username to find this. The GUID is included at the end of the URL of the resulting page. (...?guid=xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxx)
Leave empty if you don't care about found state

description.include_question: Include Waypoint question in Cache description
description.include_waypoint_description: Include description of the Waypoint in Cache description
description.include_adventure_lab_description: Include the description of the Adventure Lab in the Cache description

exclude.owner_hint: Separated by new line, comma or semicolon
exclude.name: Exclude by Adventure Lab name
exclude.name_hint: Separated by new line, comma or semicolon. Excludes names that contain the entered words
exclude.uuids_hint: Advanced feature, use only if you know what you are doing. See #44 for details

quirks.bom2csv: Add BOM to cachetur.no CSV file (for Excel)

validation.check: There are errors. Please check double check your settings

locate.not_available: You Browser does not support Geolocation.
